title: Authorizes a stay in proceedings to recover possession of real property based upon non-payment, and authorizes payment of installments
summary: Permits the court to stay a warrant issued in favor of a successful petitioner in cases where the respondent has defaulted in the payment of rent for a period not to exceed three months from the date of the judgment and to condition the same upon payment of installments from time to time.
lawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to providing for a stay in certain proceedings to recover possession of real property
